title: Natsume Yuujinchou Itsuka Yuki no Hi ni OVA
alternative_title: 夏目友人帳 新作OVA いつかゆきのひに
description: During a winter walk, Natsume Takashi meets a snowman yokai who is searching for something she is lost and cannot seem to recall and decides to help her despite not knowing what exactly she is looking for.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
